search_results.snippet:
The Thin Red Line is a 1998 American ensemble epic war film written and 
directed by Terrence Malick. Based on the novel by James Jones, it tells a semi-
fictionalized version of the Battle of Mount Austen, which was part of the 
Guadalcanal Campaign in the Pacific Theater of World War II.
